1.「何度も往復させて すまんな <pc>。| ふたりが 破邪の秘技の試練に向かう前:
Sorry for all the back and forth,|. There is something I need to|tell you before you two head off to the trials|
|of the secret of destruction.

2.「レビュール街道北の 王家の墓の下に| 人知れず広がる 迷宮についての話だ。: I'm talking about the labyrinth that lies|hidden beneath the Royal Tomb on Reviewle|Highway North.

3.「その名を…… 王家の迷宮と言う。: It is called... the Royal Maze.

4.「王家の迷宮……。| 聞いたことがありませんが それは？: Royal Maze... never heard of it. What is it?

6.「今の ふたりの修行の場として| 最も適切であると 判断したからだ。: We decided that this was the most appropriate|place for the two of us to train.

8.「アンルシアが 破邪の秘技を会得したとて| そなたたち自身が 強くならなければ|:
Even if Anlucia has mastered the secret|technique of destruction, it is difficult to|defeat the Great Demon King and his army|
|unless you yourselves become stronger.

9.「だが 王家の迷宮に 挑むことで| 勇者と盟友は さらなる成長を 望めるだろう。: But by challenging the Royal Maze, Hero and|his allies will be able to grow even more.|Therefore, I will open the Royal Maze.

10.「現世と霊界の狭間にある 王家の迷宮に挑むには| 肉体という衣を脱ぎ 精神体と化:
To challenge the Royal Maze, which lies|between this world and the spirit world, you|must take off your physical body and become a|
|spirit. Think of this as a doorway to that|end.

11.「扉の向こうは 王家の墓へと つながっている。| 中に入ったら 奥にある大扉をく: The door leads to the Royal Tomb. Once inside,|go through the great door at the back, and the|labyrinth should unfold beyond.

12.「……さて。実際に 行く前に| いくつか 王家の迷宮について| 聞いておいてもら: Well... now. Before we actually go, there are|a few things you should hear about the Royal|Maze.

13.「この迷宮に入れるのは 勇者と盟友| そして 盟友の従える魔物のみだ。| 旅の仲:
Only Hero, his allies, and the monsters that|follow him can enter this labyrinth. You|cannot enter the labyrinth with your|
|companions.

14.「それと 探索の途中で 迷宮の外に出る時は| この うつしよのカギが必要になる。: Also, when you go out of the labyrinth during|your search, you will need this World Key.|I'll leave it with you.

18.<color_yellow>迷宮に入るには 勇気の輝石が必要です。|勇気の輝石は:
To enter the labyrinth, you need|a Courage Stone. You can get 15 Courage Stones|per week, and the remaining number can be|
|checked at the Door of Light.

19.「ありがとうございます ルシェンダさま。| 私と <pc>のふたりは| 王家の迷: Thank you, Lady Lushenda. I and <pc>|will both train in the Royal Maze.

20.「王家の迷宮は 未知なる領域だ。| 少しずつ チカラをつけながら| 徐々に進んで: The Royal Maze is uncharted territory. It will|be good if you progress gradually as you gain|strength.

21.「……その果てに 何が待つのかは| まだ 誰にも わからない。| 決して 無理は: No one knows yet what awaits us at the end of|it all. Never take it easy.

23.<color_yellow>光の扉からは アンルシアの|装備変更や スキル振り分: <color_yellow>From the door of light, you can|also change Anlucia's equipment and set her|skill distribution.
